name: In The City HoBo Bag
description: Winter, summer, spring or fall my handcrafted In The City HoBo Bag  will  be of service to you in your hour of need. Measures a generous 20" wide by 27" long and 4 1/2" deep. Just the right dimensions to carry all the things that are important to you. Made of 100 percent cotton and cotton blend, this shoulder toten' bag is lightweight but sturdy. It is balanced so that when you do fill it up the the fabric will not add unnessary weight. Comfortable on your shoulder. You will not want to be without this bag no matter what the situation. Oversized button and loop closure with  inside pocket. Oh la la!, now that's moxie.
